allow:
Bash(git commit -m "$\(cat <<''EOF''
docs: add Epic 1 dev context tracking

Create docs/stories/epic-1/dev-context.md to maintain development state:
- Summary of completed Stories 1.1-1.3
- Key files created and their purpose
- Important implementation decisions
- What NOT to recreate \(avoid duplications\)
- References for next dev agent

This file will be updated after each story completion and referenced
in all dev prompts to ensure context continuity between agents.

Co-Authored-By: Claude Sonnet 4.5 <noreply@anthropic.com>
EOF
\)")
